articles.description:
Renowned actor and filmmaker Manoj Kumar, popularly known as 'Bharat Kumar,’ has passed away at the age of 87 after a prolonged illness.

articles.title: India Ranks 36th In Global Readiness For Frontier Technologies: UN Report
articles.description: India ranks 36th out of 170 nations on a global index measuring a country's readiness for frontier technologies, improving its ranking from last year, according to a UN report.

articles.description: The industry veteran, whose films ruled the box office in the late 1960s and 1970s, had been ailing for a while and died of age related issues at the Kokilaben Ambani Hospital around 3.30AM

articles.title: Manoj Kumar Passes Away At 87
articles.description: The actor, affectionately known as 'Bharat Kumar' for his portrayal of patriotic roles in numerous films, breathed his last at 4:03 am at the Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospital in Mumbai.
